basic.floral_language:
Tradescantia sillamontana
Floriography: unique, vigorous, characteristic
Has a unique characteristics, fleshy thin oval leaves in dark green, covered by dense white hairs, easy to take care, suitable for home decoration, can be place on desks, tables, high ornamental value, 
Likes gentle sunshine, tolerates to half shade, place under bright scattered light in summer. Flowers sometimes, purple or pink.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, pink or purple flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like moderate light, resistant to half shade, put in places with scattered light in summer
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
